snippet: The African National Congress celebrated its 100th anniversary this weekend at a lavish jamboree, focusing on its revered history rather than bitter schisms that now divide it.
abstract: African National Congress celebrates its 100th anniversary at a lavish jamboree in Johannesburg, focusing on its revered history rather than the bitter schisms and accusations that now divide it.

byline.original: By JOHN ELIGON and LYDIA POLGREEN

lead_paragraph: The African National Congress celebrated its 100th anniversary this weekend at a lavish jamboree, focusing on its revered history rather than bitter schisms that now divide it.

headline.main: A Revered, and Divided, Liberator of South Africa
headline.print_headline: A Revered, and Divided, Liberator of South Africa
